testimonials.text: Olger is a very stuborn person,he wants always to solve the problem no matter what.

That Olger Sema must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may not have finished the  University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
